name: Fade to Black unframed original
description:
Unframed original flag by Pam Glew
Bleaching Technique on vintage american flag
Signed by the artist with embroidery on bottom corner of fabric.

Unframed flag size 146 x 83 cm / 57.5 x 32.6 inches
Artwork supplied with dowel hidden in the fabric at the top and bottom of the artwork for hanging unframed.

Artwork is supplied unframed for UK and international buyers

Framing options are available for UK buyers, please contact info@pamglew.co.uk if you are interested in framing options.

name: Black Swan Brocade Hoop
description:
Black Swan
'Burn out' screen print on vintage brocade. 12 inch hoop. 

Black Swan is from a new range of limited fabric screen prints framed on dark wooden embroidery hoops. Portrait of Lupe Velez, a dramatic and stunning actress from the 1930s.
The hoop is signed in thread by the artist on the front PG13. 
Framed on a dark dyed wooden embroidery hoop frame & backed with contrasting vintage fabric & labelled 'Pam Glew edition'.

Framed on a dark dyed wooden embroidery hoop frame & backed with contrasting vintage fabric & labelled on the back 'Pam Glew edition'.

name: Ephemeral original drawing
description:
New drawing on a page of a beautiful old antique French dictionary. I'm aiming to fill all the pages of the dictionary with a drawing, so its going to be a longterm project, added to over the coming months.

The page is on the E's ('epauler' to 'epidaure'), this is an original drawing, drawn ontop of book illustrations of a sword, a sparrow hawk and a mayfly 'ephemere'.

The page has been ripped out of the book, so has a raw edge to the side.

The sketch was drawn with pencil and inktense inks, white ink and coloured pencil. On the bottom of the page is my monogram "PG" crest printed in silver. It is signed on the bottom and dated 2013.

121 x 191 mm

This is from a new series of drawings on small pages of vintage books, only available in this shop.

name: Out of the Water - Small Jack artist proof 3/5
description:
Out of the Water - Small Jack edition artist proof 3/5
Burn out print on vintage union jack.
Portrait of the Artist
Artist proof 3/5- embroidered in silver  
Signed PG12 - embroidered in silver  

17 x 27.5cm

Burn out print is a type of screen print where the pigment is taken away by screen printing, which reveals the flag beneath the black dye - it is also called 'discharge printing' and is a specialist screen printing technique. 

This edition is on a real cotton vintage union jack flag, available ready to frame.

name: Window to the World - edition of 30
description:
'Window to the World' 

This is a large scale, beautifully printed by fine art printers. This 2 colour original screen print is a bright vivid red and deep black on very thick paper. The portrait is based on Ko Ah-seong in the film Host.

Printed on heavy weight 300 gsm Bockingford Acid Free mould made, buffered paper. Unframed.

'Window to the World' Hand pulled Screen Print
The portrait is based on Ko Ah-seong in the film 'Host' 
Paper Size -  100.5 cm x 70.5 cm (40 inches X 27.5 inches)
Edition of 30
Signed & Dated - Bottom right

name: Limited Edition Tote Bag
description:
The original Pam Glew tote bag labeled inside 'Pam Glew limited edition'

Made of Cotton calico, and good for shopping, scrunches up small so you can always be nice to the environment,

MATERIAL: Cotton calico, dyed using traditional pigment dyes
SIZE: 38w x 43h - handle length 63cms
PRINT AREA: 28 x 28cms
LIMITED EDITION OF: 200

They are fairtrade accredited, so the cotton is from farmers who have decent working conditions and get a better price for their work.
